Text: It works great on 10.6.3 (Snow Leopard)... So, thank you very much.
Really? That's great! Thanks for the info. :D
Yes, but obviously, you need X11/XQuartz installed. Tested on iMac 7,1 with 10.6.3 and MBA 3,2 with 10.6.8.

When I compiled the custom wine engine, gcc was being a bitch and wouldn't accept the 10.6 SDK so I had to use 10.7 SDK instead. I don't know how it still works in Snow Leopard but I'm happy that it does :)
By the way to save press the "S" key while in exploring mode.

I don't know how it still works in Snow Leopard…

Because it's exactly the same OS, except the fucking Mac App Store/Sandbox/Trojan removal and the, oh yeah! fullscreen awesome feature for most applications or games. It is not the place for this troll, is it ?

hotkeys pleeeeeeaaaaseee... love this game but cant sell cards...
Theres no hotkey to sell cards.. While in the Edit Deck/Sell Cards section of a town you just right click on the card you want to sell and select "Sell for x Gold"
